Flub.Name: Apply Brightness + Contrast
Flub.Description: Applies Brightness + contrast to the incoming color map.

Flub.Name: Apply HSL
Flub.Description: Applies HSL to the incoming color map.

Flub.Name: Apply Autolevel
Flub.Description: Applies Autolevel to the incoming color map.

Flub.Name: Apply Equalize
Flub.Description: Applies Equalize to the incoming color map.

Flub.Name: Apply Gamma
Flub.Description: Applies Gamma to the incoming color map.

Flub.Name: Auto Gamma
Flub.Description: Automatically choose a gamma value based on the input.

Flub.Name: Apply Clarity
Flub.Description: Applies localized contrast enhancements to the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Apply Noise
Flub.Description: Applies noise to the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Noise
Flub.Description: The amount of noise to be applied.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the process.

Flub.Name: Blur
Flub.Description: Applies Blur to the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: Amount of Blur to be applied.

Flub.Name: None
Flub.Description: Does not flip the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Both
Flub.Description: Flips the incoming map both horizonally and vertically.
